title: Llama 4: Multimodal Intelligence
summary: The Llama 4 herd: The beginning of a new era of natively multimodal AI innovation
content: Ulama 4 Scout, a 17 billion active parameter model with 16 experts, is the best multimodal model in the world in its class and is more powerful than all previous generation Llama models, while fitting in a single NVIDIA H100 GPU.
author: newAinews
